column1: Little Goat Diner////For dinner we split the patty melt which was just an ooey gooey mess of cheese
column3: I ended up eating it with a fork and knife because of the mess factor but I would not have changed it a bit. We also got two sides
column4: the tempura mashed potatoes and the Mac and cheese. I looooved the mashed potatoes
column5: just eat them quickly or the tempura looses its crunch. The mac would be my least favorite item of the night
column6: but even at that it was great. I just prefer mine a bit thicker
column7: this was almost like a cream sauce on shells.
